title: Where the rubbers meet the road: Durex owner Reckitt launches condom delivery service
text:
Online food delivery firms have revolutionised the way people eat, giving consumers access to a wide range of different cuisines without having to leave their sofa.

Now Durex owner Reckitt Benckiser has caught on to the trend and is allowing customers to order condoms at the same time as getting their favourite pizza delivered.

The service, which is available in China and Latin America, is part of a wider drive by Reckitt to keep up with changing consumer habits and fierce local competition.

In Latin America deliveries are available through Rappi, an on-demand app which lets customers order food and medication and even request that courier withdraws cash on their behalf to then be delivered. ...
